content.detailedDescription: while outside in the evening, approx 9:00 p.M.Noticed light object cross sky heading west.  thought at first falling star, butstopped aburtly and disappeared.  then reappeared heading north across sky atextreme speed and then disappeared.  shortly after witnessed airplane in samearea moving across sky southwest.  not sure what it was, wondering if anyoneelse witnessed event.
content.summary: Light moving across sky at high speed.  disappeare

content.detailedDescription: I had gotton into my bead my little brother was already sleaping and my otherwas in the bathroom,and i was looking in to my hall when i turned to my windowwhere i saw a huge v triangular traingular shape i coudent see the top becauseit ws so dark outside there was blue and purple lights on it i looked at it forabout 30 secods then it went behind a tree line and thats the last i saw of it
content.summary: I saw a v shaped out my window with blinding light

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9-930pm.I was inside a double decker bus as i was going to pick upfamily at victoria train station in london. i was in ladbroke grove in a 52 busand i was looking out to the sky and i noticed first this really bright lookingstar. then it started moving randomly or in an erratic way. it disappeared andreappeared about 5 minutes minutes later next to this cylinder shaped craftwhich was slightly shrouded in a myst which to me seemed to reflect theskylight. i was just looking amazed and i did not say anything to people aroundme ( there were only about 7 in the top deck of the bus) as i did not wantpeople to think i am a lunatic. then after about 10 minutes or so theydisapeared. i woul like to know if anyone has seen this on this day.
content.summary: Sighting over london

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was outside my house taking the garbage to the street.2.I was looking at howclear the sky was. 3.I thought it was a shooting star, and looked in the sky tosee if there were others or where that one came from.4.As i looked i noticed arepeat of what i just saw, about 1,000 feet distance northeast of the first one,moving in the same direction.5. within seconds i saw the same thing again aboutanother 1,000 feet from the second one, moving in the same direction. 6.It wentbehind the trees, and i couldnt see it after that.In summery i saw three quickflashes of light, moving in the same direction in less then two seconds time.The distance covered in the period of observation was much greater then any manmade object could achieve in that period of time.
content.summary: I saw 3 quick flashes of light move quickly across

content.detailedDescription: At the time, i was inside my house...I heard a helicopter flying about...Istepped outside to see it and i saw it flying around the ufo. so i ran insideand got my camera and began to tape. at first i tought it might be a silverballoon. but once it hovered to the east emitting white lites i knew it had tobe foreign.  so i videotaped the whole event of the helicopter flying around itas it hovered slowly to the east and disapeared behind trees. the object at alltimes seemed to be changing, looked like a silver saucer shaped ball that keptchanging form and has several white lites on the bottom. amazingly i remainedcalm throught out the event and was able to get very good footage of this ufo.Im happy to say the tape speaks for itself.
content.summary: I saw and videotaped a silver saucer shaped ufo. v
Triangular object seen twice in 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Driving dont morrison drive heading north. noticing a triangular object hoveringin the sky from the corner of my eye. we stop to study the object and drive toan open area of the street. the object had 3 lights on the back, 1 on the frontand a red one in the middle. the object then begins to move at high speeds as webegin driving to wal-mart seeming as if it is following us. then fades into thedistance. sky was clear at all times. i first noticed the object when erinpointed it out. i thought the object was a difflicted/deformed plane until irealized it was something inexplainable. i was freaked, shocked, interested,freaked, psyched, and freaked once more. the object was hovering and moving athigh speeds. it faded away into the distance.
content.summary: Triangular object seen flying in the urban area.
Odd flashing light seen over toronto

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of a very strange looking sunset. after taking thepicture i never checked it until later when i observed what appears to be a disclike object moving from left to right. i think i saw movement when i took thepicture but i cant saw with 100 per cent certainty. none of the other 6 peoplepresent saw or heard anything.
content.summary: Taking picture of cloud formations and sunset.

content.detailedDescription: standing at my front gate. neighbor kids yellingalains! a ufo. observed and call my wife out to see it. 3large brightyellow/orange lights in a row. left light flashed off and on again. center lightdid same right light did same, in section from left to right then alldisapeared.
content.summary: Three large gold lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: This is an attempt (recommended in e-mail by peter davenport) to get aninvestigator to this area just se of brewton.  there are ongoing events here andlots of witnesses to interview. i have contact with two reliable witnesses (iwas once a mufon member - pensacola/gulf breeze - art hufford) who say they canget local people to speak out.  a recent sighting by both these two (a third isalso involved) really spurred this request.  nobody in pcola/gulf breeze seemsinterested.  im a private investigator and college grad.  need investigatorhere.  please help.  scant information above is because i myself am not awitness to se brewton events but to others.
content.summary: Low flying orbs, lights, etc. boomerang - landing?

content.detailedDescription: This is an excerpt of the fi summary report:each witness was interviewed separately and each made drawings of what they hadseen and answered questions from form 1.The three boys were headed east on hill rd. after dropping off a fourth person. they were returning from a meeting of the order of demolay.  dg was driving theolder model monza hatchback, jh was in the front passenger seat, and kp wasseated behind jh.  kp was leaning back looking through the top of the hatchbackwindow.  approx. 1/2 mile after dropping the fourth person off at his home kpsaid, "look at that!"  they pulled the car over and dg rolled down his windowand at 2:00 in the horizon he saw red, blue, white, and green lights flashing insequence.  he stopped the engine, put out his lights.  they all got out of thecar.  there were two sizes of lights.  the largest were the blue and whitelights with the blue lights being the brightest.  at the ends, smaller in size,were the red and green lights just as bright in intensity.  the lights emittedextremely bright camera-flash style strobe flashes moving right to left in afront to rear motion headed in a north-northeastward direction.  the colorsseemed to change position.  they gave the impression of a cigar shaped object. the lights moved into a cloud bank and he could see the reflection of the lightsstill moving inside the cloud.  the lights left the cloud and slowly went out ofsight maintaining the same altitude in a straight line course.  dg said thelights were as bright as the moon and probably aspirin tablet size at armslength.  he estimated the speed at 70-75 mph and said the lights were brighterthan two airplanes they saw later on the way home.  witness jh has the same basic story. saw three white flashing lights whichflashed in a line from right to left and moved in a straight flight parallel tothe car in a w to e direction.  he estimated the lights to be 1-2 miles highmoving at a speed of 150-200 mph.    no noise and no physical shape noticed.  heestimated the length of the light to be two car lengths (chevettes).  he statedthe lights never went behind any clouds.Kh states that he noticed a bright white light in the sky which seemed to bemoving in a zig-zag motion towards the southeast.  he said the lights seemed toraise in elevation as it came toward them though it did not pass over them. after a while the lights gradually sped up and faded off into the easternhorizon.  he saw the lights for a period of 5-6 minutes.  he states they werebright and constant, no flashing.  he also states the lights did not passthrough any clouds during the sighting.
content.summary: Multiple witnesses see nocturnal lights in swartz

content.detailedDescription: This is a summary of the field investigators report:in the summer of 1989 the witnesses were fishing at a small lake called saubeelake in eaton county.  between the time period of 11:00 p.M. to 12:30 p.M.During the last week of july, as stated by one witness they both saw between twoand three craft (depending on who told the account), many lights, and a jet. all of which was over saubee lake.  the lake was small in size with houseslocated along the shoreline at the main point of entrance to the lake.  the 21 y/o witness stated that at the time of the sighting he looked at thewindows on the craft.  he said inside the craft there was a coloration of gray. during this interview an appointment was made with the second witness for aninterview.  on november 19, 1990 i met with the second witness for about 30minutes.  some differences were noted between the two accounts.  this secondwitness hesitated in giving me indepth information.  the 21 y/o witness describes the object as, "very large looked like a giantmorel mushroom, also a bright white flashing in the center of object for approx.10 sec.  the first object was  approx. 60-80 ft. wide.  it moved up and downjust floating over the tree top.  made no sound, color was bright pinkish toreddish orange.  second object was a cone shape much smaller than the first oneand had a cone shaped window in the center with a very bright white light comingfrom inside.  the first object disappeared in the trees after 20 minutes ofwatching it.  the second object went to the same spot the first one went to. motor wouldnt start on boat, they avoid lights including my flashlight when ishined it at them."the second witness simply states, in reply to the form 1 questions, "i was atthe lake fishing and my friend told me to look."  i saw a, "red dot in the sky",and "i didnt pay much attention to it.  it looked like a triangle shape, itstayed still.  it moved fast."
content.summary: Ce1 on saubee lake - 2 fishermen see strange objec
Sorry unsure where to report this kind of sighting

content.detailedDescription: After waking froom afternoon shift the next afternoon i was in the lake near theshore working with my brother building a wave break to stop erosion on thelakeeshore.  my brother became suddenly exhausted and lay down and fell asleepthirty feet away.  i was picking rocks out of the shallows when i notiaced ablack strobe-like effect through the top of my head.  i looked up to where itwas from and there in a ytoung tree was a ball of sine-waves of light.  i hadbeen thinking about someone showing up at my work site who i expect meant meharm.  the next day i remembered and ws vexed, which is when the massiveaudio-visual hallucination occurred.  the ball of sine-waves of light moving inperfect symmetry.  a voice that sounded like thousands and thousands of trumpetsof thunder spoke to me with telepathy.  i spoke back the same way.  i stood andobserved the ball of sine-waves of light for a short period of time until a carcarryi8ng three born again achristians camea down the cottage road.  i spokewith regional mufon director ed barker about the encounter.  "sounds like youwere programmed."  he said.  dr. j.R, delgado approached me during the followingcourt proceedings and shook my hand at the black box delusion trial when i wasfdound not guilty by reason of insanity.  for a decasde afterwarad i wouldexperience of flashing behind my eyes, which may very well have been caused byeye problems and not the massive audio-visual hallucination.  enter yournarrative description hereplease limit your narrative to 2000 words (equivalent to 6 typed pages).
content.summary: Burning bush ball of sine-waves of light

content.detailedDescription: 1.We were on the balcony of my room2.We were just looking at the stars andnoticed two moving red ones3.Star/planet4.During: i couldnt take my eyes offthem after: discussed with other witness5.They were basically red stars in thedistance that moved at very high speed in every direction6.They moved at suchhigh speed that my eyes lost track of them and they were gone
content.summary: Two red stars which moved rapidly in different dir

content.detailedDescription: went outside w/ 10x30 canon is binocs to look atsky. too bright for stars, then noticed one very bright planet, but time notright for venus or jupiter.Could not quite resolve it to one point of light inbinocs, almost appeared tobe double blobs.  observed a few airliners and wentback to the bright object.This object then exploded into so many pieces itappeared to be a galaxy seenedge on.  after a few seconds a smaller piece movedfurther south out the theexplosion along the axis of the event. all were nowgetting dimmer, and dissapeared after a few more seconds.  all this occurredbefore i could seeany other stars.  i have observed jupiter, venus, mars etc inmy 8 inch schmidtand do not believe this was a planet.  probably totallyunrelated, but at 9 pmcould make out at f-16 cross the same area at 35-40degrees my location. i hope someone else saw this, because i would sure like toknow what it was.
content.summary: Very bright light in west/south west, exploded.

content.detailedDescription: i was on my land in pine meadow ranches, lot 34near pine hill new mexico. i was bed down outside on the ground and in the theopen. i was about to go to sleep when out of the corner of my eye i saw in theeast a light like it had just came on and quikcly got brighter and brighter.Ive never seen a light so bright in the sky before, it almost seem to light upthe area.  it only lasted a couple seconds then became a small light, like astar, and began moving south in a very strange pattern. it jumped up and down,or zigzaged up and down rather dramtically. if the horizon were a yard stick ionly saw this thing move for about 2 inches and then i could not see it anymore. the distance was about as far as one usually sees a satilite, but i haveseen satillites many times but never seen one move like this or have lightbehavior like this.  it was erie.  thank you.
content.summary: Flashinchange to a small light then up and down dr

content.detailedDescription: I saw tha object when i was 8 years old in 1995. i am 15 now. i dont rememberexactly what happened. but i remember i was siting on my bed looking out mybedroom window. it was very early in the morning...Maybe one or 2 oclock. ilooked towards the mountains and saw the object. it was there for a few minutesand then went straight up. i really didnt think much of it. after that i raninto my mothers room. she didnt see anything. and i had forgotten about ituntil about a year ago
content.summary: Black disk, neon blue lights, rotating
Saw saucer emiting cone of light

content.detailedDescription: I awoke to find myself panicked, trying to get the bathroom light on whilefacing into my bedroom.There was an object floating outside my bedroom window.It had 4 colored lights on it and was a sphere.The lights divided it into 4separate colors like a simon game i had when i was a kid.Suddenly i heard goback to bed and as i walked back into my room, the object went over the top ofthe house and came down outside my sons window.I went back to bed and did noteven wake my husband. i do not remember anything after that.
content.summary: I awoke to find myself out of bed, standing in the

content.detailedDescription: The object was noticed in the early morning (approx. 5:31) of sunday, june 23,2002. the location was the tiny community of lacawanna township, pennslvania.The object was first noticed by two school age boys, camping out late at nightin their back yard. they noticed a floresent greenish-blue light over theneighbors house. at first glance the object appeared to hover at 400 to 500 feetinthe air and then about 3  minutes later shot straight into the air in anupwards direction,as if to go into the sky.After that the object disappearedwithin seconds. the total alotment of time that elapased between the time offirst sight and the time that the object shot into the sky was about 5 minutes.At the first sight the boys thougt it was a helacopter,however only secondslater realised it was something quite differrent since it was fairly lowflying,made absolutly no noise or sound what so ever and gave off the brightlight. in the moments of coming to this conclusion, the boys were stunned.
content.summary: Night

content.detailedDescription: was looking for low flying aeroplanes .Heard thenoise of one..But it was a helicopter ,,since i already had the camera in myhand decided to take a photo anyway...Looked at the lcd screen and there were 2objects on it..Upload it to the p.C. and there was the helicopter and somethingelse..Still have the image on the camera aswell as on my p.C
content.summary: Never saw or heard anything apart from the helicop

content.detailedDescription: When i drove back home from a friend, i drove on the n225 from woudenberg tozeist. when i was driving, i just happend to look a bit up to the sky. for noreason at all. i was driving about 80 km an hour in my car, driving in a curvein the road. but yet, i could clearly see a few lightb4s in the sky that seemed to be linked. it was dome-shaped, the dome, createdby the lights. in the centre/middle, there was also one light. the rest couldnot be seen, because it was or black like the sky, or transparant. it seemed tobe hovering above a hotel, which is closeby. i immedietly slowed down my car,and backed up, because it was disappering behind some trees. i havenb4t seen the object moving, but when i stopped the car from backing up, i couldnot see it any more. i guess i saw it for one second, but it was very visibleand clear. i immedietly thought it was an ufo. this, because it was not movingand seemed to be hovering. i also have a few books about ufob4s and recognised it as an ufo.
content.summary: Saw lights in a saucer-pattern

content.detailedDescription: Background:the sighting was by four witnesses: a mother (the primary witness), her twochildren, and her niece.  i was put in contact with the primary witness throughbob schultz, of minnesota mufon, who is a mutual friend.  i then contacted herand interviewed her and her two children.  the fourth witness (the niece) nowresides in germany.  i have mailed her a sighting form, but have not yetreceived a response.  i have therefore decided to file this report with thethree witnesses only, to be updated if/when i obtain the fourth witness report.Witness descriptions:the witnesses are a mother, her niece and her two daughters,.  at the time ofthe sighting, the mother was age 33, the daughters were ages 6 and 7, and theniece was age 15.   all witnesses describe their health and hearing as excellent.  the mother hasminor visual astigmatism and wears glasses, correcting her vision to 20/20.  shewas wearing her glasses at the time of the sighting.  the vision of all othersis either uncorrected 20/20 or correctable to 20/20.  there do not appear to beany health effects related to the sighting.The mother is very interested in both ufo and metaphysical topics.  the familyhas indicated no other major ufo-related or anomalous experiences.  however, themother has indicated one other possible sighting by both her and her husband.Sighting account:the witnesses were driving to their family cabin in central, minnesota, and weretraveling west bound, in their car at about 9pm cdt, on august 8, 2000.  theywere approximately three miles west of the town of howard lake, minnesota, oncounty hwy 13 (detour of us hwy 12).  the mother was driving, her 15 year oldniece was in the front passenger seat, and her two daughters were in the backseat.  she noted that the road was busier than usual, and that traffic wasmoving slowly on this detour routethe mother observed what seemed to be lights ahead of them, apparently aiming atthem.  she initially felt that they seemed like aircraft, and also observed thatthere was no noise present, beyond that from the cars travel.  curious, sheslowed the car and observed them.  as they approached, she noticed that what waspreviously visible only as lights, now resolved into disks.  she noted that the car in front of theirs had pulled over to the side of theroad, and that other cars seemed to have slowed down as well.  she pulled theircar off to the side of the road as well, and opened the car windows to watch theobjects.  nobody said anything as they watched the objects approach.  they sawthe object(s) come from the west (anti-parallel to their path), then swoop tothe south, away from the road, passing behind nearby trees and out of sight.As they watched, the mother initially thought that they were some form ofexperimental craft, and then decided that they had to be unidentified objects. once she realized that the objects were ufos, she describes her reaction as oneof amazement.   she estimated that the objects moved at approximately the speed of cars on thehighway, somewhat faster than the cars in the oncoming lane [cl note: 60 +/- 10mph?].  she noted that although passing quite close to them, the objectsappeared to make no noise.  she notes that there were no other aircraft visibleduring the time of the sighting.  at closest approach, the objects were on theorder of one or so blocks distant from them.  once the lights were lost behind the trees, they resumed driving, pulling outonto the road.  at this time, the other cars that had either pulled off orbriefly slowed down now began to resume their normal speed.The witnesses arrived at their cabin at the expected time, indicating that noapparent missing time occurred [cl note: see update at end of investigatorcomments].Object description:the mother and her niece, both in the front seat observed three objects (note:the children in the back seat both describe seeing only one object) travelingabout 70 feet above the ground.  their movement appeared to be smooth toswooping, as they shifted their path to the south.  there was no apparentrotation to the objects, with two bright lights on each object always pointingin their direction of travel.  they appeared to be dark metallic with a lighterturquoise color to their central region.  the objects moved in a triangular formation, with one object being lower, andthe other two being slightly above.  the lower object was about 70 feet abovethe ground.Mothers description of objects size:   about 30 - 40 m in diameter.  description by daughters:each of the daughters observed only one object.  the six year old daughter wasin the left seat (closest to the object), looking out the rear window.  [clnote: she indicated she was on the right, but this was as looking backwards].The six-year old daughter described the size of the object as about the size ofthe moon [cl note: moon size is often overestimated, suggesting that these were prettylarge objects - cl est.: apparent moon width due to optical illusion is oftensubjectively given as two fingers width at arms length].   the seven year old daughter was in the right seat, also looking backwards outthe rear window.  she described the object as being round, gray in color, with red lights on theside and non-blinking green lights in the interior.  there was a rectangularfeature in the center which glowed with a light green color.  this witness described the object as being "bigger than an airplane, onlyround."  cl note: it is notable that the daughters each observed only one object, whilethe mother observed three.  they felt that this might have been due to the twoupper objects being obscured from the daughters view by the car roof.  bothdaughters and the mother each drew slightly differing depictions of theobject(s), with somewhat different lighting configurations, etc.  however theoverall configuration of the object as seen by all was similar in all cases.
content.summary: Wright county mult wit close flyby  - aug 1999 [re
